name: Snail Race (Joostan)
description:
Description:

Race against the snail and score as many points as you can!

This game was made with Kenta Cho's crisp-game-lib.

Monogatari was created as part of the CMPM170 curriculum at UCSC Fall Quarter 2022. This game was made amongst other games to explore rapid, mechanics-focused prototyping with a focus on single-button input.
